sourcesContent:
<style src="./LoginView.css" scoped></style>

<template>
	<b-container fluid class="d-flex justify-content-center align-items-center min-vh-100 bg-dark">
	  <!-- Image de fond -->
	  <b-img src="@/assets/background_retro.jpg" alt="background img" id="background" class="position-absolute w-100 h-100" fluid hidden></b-img>
	  
	  <b-card class="login-page p-4 text-center" bg-variant="light" text-variant="dark" style="max-width: 400px;">
		<b-form @submit.prevent="onLogin">
		  <b-form-group>
			<b-form-input 
			  v-model="username" 
			  type="text" 
			  placeholder="Enter Username" 
			  required>
			</b-form-input>
		  </b-form-group>
  
		  <b-form-group>
			<b-form-input 
			  v-model="password" 
			  type="password" 
			  placeholder="Enter Password" 
			  required>
			</b-form-input>
		  </b-form-group>
  
		  <b-button type="submit" variant="primary" class="btn" block id="login_btn">Login</b-button>
		</b-form>
	  </b-card>
	</b-container>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  export default {
	data() {
	  return {
		username: '',
		password: ''
	  };
	},
	methods: {
	  onLogin() {
		// Logique de soumission du formulaire
		console.log('Username:', this.username);
		console.log('Password:', this.password);
		// Vous pouvez ajouter ici la logique de connexion (authentification, validation, etc.)
	  }
	}
  }
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  body, html {
	margin: 0;
	height: 100%;
	width: 100%;
  }
  
  .bg-dark {
	background-color: black;
  }
  
  .login-page {
	background-color: white;
	border-radius: 5px;
  }
  
  #background {
	opacity: 0.3;
  }
  </style>
